page.title: 06SHERBORNE POST OFFICE
page.content: There is only one shop in the area and that is Sherborne post office.It is in the middle of a terrace of three cottages. You have to go up a path which has a garden on either side which belong to the shop.The post box is on the right of the door.The shop is not only a post office,but a food store as well.All round the shop walls behind the counter there are shelves full of tins and boxes.There is a fridge with cheese,bacon and gateaux.There is also a freezer which has ice cream and frozen foods.There are all kinds of sweets,crisps,cans of drink and vegetables.At the back of the shop there is a meat cutter.On one side there is the post office counter. It sells animal food,pencils, sharpeners,colouring books and post cards.The shop is owned by Mr.Taylor and his wife.
